code: import React from'react';import Title from'./Title';import{services}from'../data';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Services=function Services(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"section services",id:"services",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Title,{title:"Our",subTitle:"Services"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"section-center services-center",children:services.map(function(service){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"service",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"service-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:service.icon})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"service-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"service-title",children:service.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"service-text",children:service.text})]})]},service.id);})})]});};export default Services;
